dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model
Class Ctr

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.Any
      dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.Ctr

public class Ctr
extends Any

Handles container specific features of a Ctxt object. A container hosts a fixed list of children all addressable by a unique name.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.a

Method Detail

isCtr

public boolean isCtr()
              throws CtxtException
Checks if the context node is a container.

Returns:
true if the context node is a ContainerDataNode or the context node is a list that hosts containers
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

isCtr

public boolean isCtr(java.lang.String path)
              throws CtxtException
Checks if the referenced node is a container.

Returns:
true if the referenced node is a ContainerDataNode or the referenced node is a list that hosts containers
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

getNames

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNames()
                                          throws CtxtException
Get the name of all containers in a list. If the context node is a container of a list the names of the containers of that list are returned. If the context node is a list the names of contained containers are returned. If the context node is a container which is not part of a list the name of that container is returned.

Returns:
The name of the containers that are referenced by the context-node or null
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of error
Since:
2008.a

getNames

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNames(java.lang.String path)
                                          throws CtxtException
Get the name of all containers in a list. If the referenced node is a container of a list the names of the containers of that list are returned. If the referenced node is a list the names of contained containers are returned. If the referenced node is a container which is not part of a list the name of that container is returned.

Returns:
The names of all container that are referenced or null
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of error
Since:
2008.a

getNames

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNames(IMExpr expr)
                                          throws CtxtException

Returns:
The names of all containers that are referenced or null

CtxtException - in case of error

copy

public boolean copy(int toIdx,
                    java.lang.String name)
             throws CtxtException
Copies the given list entry and adds it at the position given by toIdx.

Parameters:
toIdx - The index to add at (counted from 1). Use -1 to add to the end
name - The name of the copied node (null to generate via name pattern)
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error

copy

                    int idx,
                    int toIdx,
                    java.lang.String name)
             throws CtxtException

Parameters:
path - path to the list
idx - index in the list of the item to copy (counted from 1)
toIdx - The index to add at (counted from 1). Use -1 to add to the end

Returns:
false on error
